description: Incorporation, bank account setup, GST, and state registrations orchestrated via one dashboard.
Weekly bookkeeping with GST/TDS filings, ROC tracking, and CFO check-ins.
Plan, approve, and maintain ESOP schemes with SH-6, SH-8, and Form PAS-3 automation.
Scenario modelling, MIS synthesis, and board reporting with compliance risk surfacing.
Payroll, PF/ESI/PT compliance, and employee onboarding analytics with anomaly flags.
Calendarised AOC-4, MGT-7, and secretarial documentation with e-sign orchestration.
Quarterly GST, advance tax, and expense classification tailored for digital-first creators.
Cross-border contracts, LUT renewals, and FEMA compliance mapped with alerts.
DPIIT recognition, royalty tracking, and trademark monitoring with audit-ready trails.
Workshops and micro-courses for founders and finance teams with certification flows.
